projectform.title: Publish a new project
projectform.registerInfo: Publish your project idea, assign the goals you want to achieve and describe the type of people you want to hire. All information is required
projectform.objetctives: Goals you want to achieve with your project (at least 1 required)
projectform.position: Positions for your project (at least 1 required)
projectform.confirm: Are you sure you want to register a project with the following information?
projectform.hirederror: You need at least 1 user for this position
projectform.removeconf1: Are you sure you want to remove the user

placeholders.title: Project title
placeholders.goaldescription: Describe what you want to achieve
placeholders.posdesc: Describe the type of people you are looking for this position
placeholders.possearch: e.g. Front End, Back End, Full Stack
placeholders.hired: How many users for this position?

title.short: Your title is required to be at least 4 characters.
title.long: Your title cannot be longer than 100 characters.

description.short: Your description is required to be at least 4 characters.
description.long: Your description cannot be longer than 500 characters.

goaltitle.short: Your title is required to be at least 4 characters.
goaltitle.long: Your title cannot be longer than 100 characters.
goaltitle.maxGoals: You can't assign more than 4 objectives

goaldescription.short: Your description is required to be at least 4 characters.
goaldescription.long: Your description cannot be longer than 500 characters.

postitle.short: Your title is required to be at least 4 characters.
postitle.long: Your title cannot be longer than 100 characters.

posdesc.short: Your description is required to be at least 4 characters.
posdesc.long: Your description cannot be longer than 500 characters.

errors.invaliddate: Invalid date! Your deadline must be at least one week from today
errors.nogoals: You have no goals! You need to assign at least one goal to your project
errors.nopositions: You have no positions! You need to assign at least one position to your project
errors.maxgoals: You can only have a maximum of 4 goals assigned
errors.maxskills: You can only have a maximum of 10 skills assigned
errors.maxpositions: You can only have a maximum of 5 positions assigned
